message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and significance, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,000. This is a special opportunity considering the product's worth to you is $12,000. I trust this proposal aligns well with your budget and needs. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
